title: Start
body:
This DnD campaign united all of your friends once, but tension in the group is pushing you all apart.
As you hang out with your friends, try to keep everyone in a good mood so they'll want to stay together.
At the moment, you're in the middle of a DnD adventure being run by your friend, Lance. He continues to narrate the story...
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"Okay, Franklin, so you threaten the goblin that's gaurding the prison cells in the dragon's citadel. What do you say?"
"Come, on, Frank. Can't be Mr. Quiet forever."
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"I just rolled a 17 for intimidation. Do I need to act it out?"
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"Man, we've always done it like that! It's how I run my campaigns."
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"It's more fun, Franklin! It makes this more social."
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait You>>
->"Ah, we don't have to. Let's just keep this chill."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<increaseValue Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<decreaseValue Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Come on, guys; that really sucks the fun out of things. DnD is all about immersing yourself in the world."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "It's not a big deal, Lance."
    "Don't get weird about things like you usually do."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    <<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Alright, alright, you big sticklers."
        "But we'd better do some actual RP at some point."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $lance_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "Okay, fine. Whatever. The goblin says you can go through."
    <<endif>>
    [[Node2]]
->"Yeah, it's a big part of the fun."
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    <<decreaseValue Allison>>
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<increaseValue Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    "Yeah, just give it a shot."
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Exactly, it's how the game works. DnD isn't as cool without roleplaying."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "Alright, Lance, you've made your point."
    "Don't get weird about things like you usually do."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Franklin, let's hear it. And put down your phone."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    <<if $franklin_is_very_pleased is true>>
        "Oh, yeah. Sorry. Let me put it away."
        "Uh, 'Begone, or I'll smite you with the power of Moradin!'"
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
        "Okay, okay."
        "Uh, 'Begone, or I'll smite you with the power of Moradin!'"
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Okay, okay."
        "Uh, 'Begone, or I'll smite you with the power of Moradin!'"
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "Alright, alright."
        "Uh, 'Get out of here, or be killed,' or something."
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
        <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
        "Hm, I guess that qualifies."
        <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<endif>>
    <<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
        "Fine."
        "'Leave, or I'll kill you,' or whatever."
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
        <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
        "Wow. Truly an inspiring performance, Franklin. Like, damn."
        <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<endif>>
    [[Node2]]

title: Node2
body:
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
<<if $lance_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "The goblin cowers away from you, Sir Fredrick. He isn't making any moves to block your passage."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "Alright, let's do this."
    "Oh, wait. Actually, let me check for traps first."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Good idea. There aren't any."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "Okay, I go through the door."
    "Oh, wait. Actually, let me check for traps first."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<increaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Good idea. There aren't any."
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "I go in."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "I go in."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
    "Fine, whatever. I go in."
<<endif>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"You see the messenger you're looking for inside. He looks pretty beat up. It seems the goblins of the citadel have been torturing him quite a bit."
"He stands up wearily, dusting off his clothes."
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body--"
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "We get it. He's real beat up."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Alright, jeez."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_very_angry is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body--"
    <<clearPortrait Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
    "We get it. He's real beat up."
    <<clearPortrait Allison>>
    <<decreaseValue Lance>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Alright, jeez."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "You feel like you can hear his bones creaking. It's as if his entire body has aged thousands of years since he's been here."
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "When you let him out, he looks at you, Sir Frederick, and says, 'Thank you, thank you so much for the rescue!'
    "'Now I must go, Sir Knight. Your lord father needs to hear a message of mine.'"
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "When you let him out, he looks at you, Sir Frederick, and says, 'Thank you, thank you so much for the rescue!'
    "'Now I must go, Sir Knight. Your lord father needs to hear a message of mine.'"
<<endif>>
<<if $lance_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "He looks at Franklin, and thanks him for being rescued."
    "Then he says, 'Now I must go, Sir Knight. Your lord father needs to hear a message of mine.'"
<<endif>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_pleased>>
    "Nice. I step graciously aside to let him get to it."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased>>
    "Cool, I get out of his way."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral>>
    "Okay, I let him go."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry>>
    "Alright, sure."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_angry>>
    "Okay. Whatever."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"Wait!"
"He should come with us for now. We need to protect him!"
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"We can't protect everyone we come across."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"But he's one of our friends! We should stay close to him."
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"He has something important to do. Let him go."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait You>>
->"If he's got work to do, then let him be."
    <<set $protecting_messenger to false>>
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<decreaseValue Ruby>>
    <<increaseValue Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    <<if $ruby_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
        "I don't know, but I'll go along if you all think we should."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Well, alright. If that's what everyone wants."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "Okay, if you're sure..."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_very_angry is true>>
        "Um, okay...
    <<endif>>
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    "Trust me, it's for the best."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    <<if $ruby_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
        "If you say so. It's just that I think we're stronger when we stick together."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
        "Okay, I just don't want us to fall apart."
        "If we don't have reinforcements, I mean. Like in a goblin attack."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
        "It's just that this doesn't feel like we're playing as a friendly group anymore."
    <<endif>>
    <<if $ruby_is_very_angry is true>>
        "..."
    <<endif>>
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<if $ruby_is_very_angry is false>>
        <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
        <<if $franklin_is_very_pleased is true>>
            "Yeah, I get what you mean."
        <<endif>>
        <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
            "I understand."
        <<endif>>
        <<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
            "I know."
        <<endif>>
        <<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
            "I know."
        <<endif>>
        <<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
            "I know."
        <<endif>>
        <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    <<endif>>
    [[Node3]]
->"Come on, we have to look out for our friends."
    <<set $protecting_messenger to true>>
    <<clearPortrait You>>
    <<increaseValue Ruby>>
    <<decreaseValue Franklin>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
    "Right!"
    <<clearPortrait Ruby>>
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    "What if that message is about an attack, or something?"
    "It could be really important."
    "Like, if he has to go, he has to go."
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
    "Hey, is that your phone buzzing again?"
    <<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
    "Oh. Yeah, give me a sec. Just have to text someone..."
    <<clearPortrait Franklin>>
    [[Node3]]

title: Node3
body:
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
<<if $protecting_messenger is true>>
    "Okay, so the messenger agrees to come with you, and thanks you for your kindness."
<<endif>>
<<if $protecting_messenger is false>>
    "Okay, so you let him go."
<<endif>>
"You keep travelling through the citadel, and eventually you find a massive door."
"Based on the draconic symbols on it, you reason that the dragon leading the goblins must be inside."
"Is everybody ready?"
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
<<if $allison_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "Yeah, man. Let's do it."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "Yep. Let's go."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "Yeah."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "Okay, I guess."
<<endif>>
<<if $allison_is_very_angry is true>>
    "Fine."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Allison>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
<<if $ruby_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "Yes! Let's go win!"
<<endif>>
<<if $ruby_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "Okay!"
<<endif>>
<<if $ruby_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "All set, I think."
<<endif>>
<<if $ruby_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "I think so."
<<endif>>
<<if $ruby_is_very_angry is true>>
    "Huh? Oh, uh, yeah."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_pleased is true>>
    "Yeah. Let's do it."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_pleased is true>>
    "Sure. I'm all set."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_feeling_neutral is true>>
    "Think I'm good."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_somewhat_angry is true>>
    "Alright."
<<endif>>
<<if $franklin_is_very_angry is true>>
    "..."
    "Okay."
<<endif>>
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"You enter. You see the dragon..."
"And it's fucking huge. It's a red dragon, and it's about 50 feet tall and wide."
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>>
"Oh, my."
<<clearPortrait Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Franklin>>
"Jesus..."
<<clearPortrait Franklin>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
"Excuse me, what?"
<<clearPortrait Allison>>
->"That's... a lot."
->"This could be awesome!"
->"So, what happens...?"
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"It spots you immediately, and takes an attack of opportunity--"
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
"Um, yeah, no. Objection, your honor."
<<clearPortrait Allison>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"What?"
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
"This is stupid. This encounter is just ridiculous."
<<clearPortrait Allison>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>>
"Is not! I worked really hard on it."
<<clearPortrait Lance>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Allison>>
"You're just grandstanding, like you always do."
"Like, 'Oh, look at me! I'm God! I can come up with the most edgy stuff imagineable to mess with all of you!'"
<<clearPortrait Allison>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait You>>
->"Well, it is a bit much. Could you tone it down, Lance?"
->"Lance worked hard on it, Allison. Let's just try it out."
